lead_paragraph: Police in New York City are seeking the public's help in finding a man who randomly stabbed an out-of-state tourist in the back of the head with a steak knife last weekend.

headline.main: NYC Police Looking for Man Who Stabbed Tourist in Head
headline.print_headline: NYC Police Looking for Man Who Stabbed Tourist in Head
